sentences.sContent: Even if it is a fantasy or an illusion, so long as it shows a ray of hope it still urges you on in pursuit of that little sparkle without letup.
sentences.sContent_eng: Even if it is a fantasy or an illusion, so long as it shows a ray of hope it still urges you on in pursuit of that little sparkle without letup.
sentences.sCn: 不管是望梅止渴，还是画饼充饥，他都会激励你不停手中的浆，去追逐哪怕一星微小的火光。
